title: abids_json_info.py
description: A tool to extract information from BIDS formatted json files.

tr_flag.title: TR flag
tr_flag.description: Print the TR from the json file in seconds, from the 'RepetitionTime' field.

te_flag.title: TE flag
te_flag.description: Print out the 'EchoTime' field in milliseconds (the json file stores it in seconds).

match_nii_flag.title: Match NII flag
match_nii_flag.description: Check if there is a .nii or .nii.gz file that matches the .json file (1 if the dataset is loadable).

field_list.title: Field list
field_list.description: Print any field or list of fields from the json file.

list_fields_flag.title: List fields flag
list_fields_flag.description: Print a list of the available fields from the .json file. This must be the only argument specified.

help_flag.title: Help flag
help_flag.description: Show this help message and exit.
